questions.question: Name two fundamental freedoms under Canadian law.

The right to enter and leave Canada and the United States freely, the right to apply for a Canadian passport, the right to be educated, the right to vote

questions.correctAnswer: The right to be educated in either official language, the right to apply for a Canadian passport, the right to vote, the right to enter and leave Canada freely
questions.question: List four additional rights Canadian citizens have under the Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedoms.

answers: Serving on a jury, keeping your yard tidy and helping others in the community
